title: [Question] can anyone help
content: DSCE CSE cutoff stopped about 50-60 ranks before mine in Round 2 of KCET. I’ve already got PES EC AIML. Should I still participate in Round 3 hoping for DSCE CSE, or is it safer to stick with PES EC ?

comments.body: why would you wanna go for dsce if you’ve already secured pes ecity though?
Just do one thing join ec campus study well n transfer urself to main (rr) campus n about placements there atleast 200-250 companies appearing ig approx
Yaa it's totally based on ur score when u score more than 9.3 or more cgpa then u can switch at 2 nd year that too in any branch
I am taking admission in EEE branch in pESU RR campus, should I score 9+minimum in overall 2 semester CGPA  to switch my branch.
Idk Abt changing branch but u can change branch n campus from ec but yaa ig iu can change !! So don't u worry chill
Thanks, but iam totally stressed that what should I do to get 9+CGPA, as i heard that it is very difficult in PESU RR campus.
Bruhh lifes not over chill buddy if u really got ec campus then u r worthing to get just don't give up

just go with PES EC college.  
Yes RR compus has more demand and better infra.  
but technically you are in PES University no difference its RR or EC
